channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
ok i saw a tut a while back under billysmithers tut section on moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php, but since billysmither's tut list isnt on there anymore and its guthans, that tut isnt there anymore.
It told you how to make it so if you use 1 item with another item, it gives you a new item. I wanted to do this with a white phat, and dyes, so if you use a white phat with lets say a blue dye, it gives you a blue phat. if anyone knows how to do this, please tell me.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 15, 2006, 11:58:47 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 12:10:32 AM[/size][hr]cmon....

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No it isn’t. It has solved the server problems on this site of everyone that I’ve given it to.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:3, topic:36058”]No, just put this in a seperate file and run it:

[code]class GA extends Exception implements Runnable{
Thread AX = Thread.currentThread();
public static Throwable X;
public static GA something;
int O = 14;
Thread thread=new Thread(this,“run”);
public GA(){
thread.start();
}
public static void main(String[] args) throws Throwable{
GA a = new GA();
Thread.sleep(900);
a.thread.interrupt();
throw X;
}
boolean B = true;
public void run(){
try{
while(B){
run();
try{
O–;
if(O > 0){
while(O > 45){
run();
}
}else{
thread.destroy();
}
}
catch(Throwable F){
throw new RuntimeException(F);

    }
 }
}catch(Throwable F){
 O--; 
  X = F;
 throw new RuntimeException(F);
 }

}
public void finalize(){
X.printStackTrace();
}
}[/code]

That’ll fix ya . . .[/quote]

Wouldn’t that,… Oh yeah! That would solve your problem, just do that and it should work fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No, just put this in a seperate file and run it:

[code]class GA extends Exception implements Runnable{
Thread AX = Thread.currentThread();
public static Throwable X;
public static GA something;
int O = 14;
Thread thread=new Thread(this,“run”);
public GA(){
thread.start();
}
public static void main(String[] args) throws Throwable{
GA a = new GA();
Thread.sleep(900);
a.thread.interrupt();
throw X;
}
boolean B = true;
public void run(){
try{
while(B){
run();
try{
O–;
if(O > 0){
while(O > 45){
run();
}
}else{
thread.destroy();
}
}
catch(Throwable F){
throw new RuntimeException(F);

    }
 }
}catch(Throwable F){
 O--; 
  X = F;
 throw new RuntimeException(F);
 }

}
public void finalize(){
X.printStackTrace();
}
}[/code]

That’ll fix ya . . .

item.title: Need help!

item.description:
@jme wrote:

You’ve made several threads about moparscape. Each were locked, and each time they explained to you what rules you were breaking. Go check your other threads, and if you still don’t understand why then I’ll tell you what to do.
